result.eng: Your folks must be pround of you.
result.ga: caithfidh go bhfuil do mhuintir bródúil asat
result.orig: Caithfidh go bhfuil do mhuintir bródúil asat
result.html: caithfidh go bhfuil do mhuintir bródúil asatYour folks must be pround of you.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ go ḃfuil do ṁuintir bródúil asatYour folks must be pround of you.

result.ga: is breá liom muintir na hÉireann
result.orig: Is breá liom muintir na hÉireann
result.html: is breá liom muintir na hÉireannI like the Irish.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom muintir na hÉireannI like the Irish.

result.eng: We liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ga: thaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.orig: Thaitin Tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúil
result.html: thaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn bhí muintir na háite an-chairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.
result.ponchtml: ṫaitin tuaisceart na hÉireann linn ḃí muintir na háite an-ċairdiúilWe liked Northern Ireland, the local people were very friendly.

result.eng: There are good amenities there and the local people are nice.
result.ga: tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deas
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deas
result.html: tá áiseanna maithe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deasThere are good amenities there and the local people are nice.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna maiṫe ann agus tá muintir na háite go deasThere are good amenities there and the local people are nice.

result.eng: All the people of the town will be there.
result.ga: beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.orig: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.html: beidh muintir an bhaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ muintir an ḃaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
